Reviews.Title: Cheesy
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: It's a bit cheesy and toy looking but the motorized pivot feature with motion detector makes up for it. Id rather have a more real looking camera and may change it once i find one. For the price its okay.

Reviews.Title: Dummy C amera
Reviews.Author: Chantel
Reviews.Content: Wasn't very pleased after we installed this camera it want aim in the position that we want it in and we can even use the battries that we bought and put in it. Beacuse it stops in the wrong place every time. we tried moving it and it still want point in the direction that we need it in. Wouldnt recommend to anybody that needs to put it in the corner because it want stay focused  on where you need it. As far as the company that sent it it got to me on time.

ProductInfo.Features:
Features Include: Motion Detection Sensor Panning Motion
Activation Led Light No wiring needed
Installation screws included Requires 3 "AA" Batteries -Not Included
This is NOT a functioning camera; however it will deter most criminal activity Measures: 2125 x 55 x 65-Inch
ProductInfo.Name: Hawk 72-1463 Rotating Imitation Security Camera with LED Light
